column31: Two bids were received. The technical bids were opened and both the bids were found to be fit and responsive. However in general three bids are required. The approval of competent authority is required to open financial bids.
column36: Bid opening summary and financial evaluation.Technical bid and financial bid opened and two bidders offered the bid. Both the bidders found responsive. Approval of competent authority will be sought. If it will be approved the work will be awarded accord
